data.title: Zwift Racing League
data.meta_description: WTRL s home to the world famous weekly WTRL Team Time Trial that takes every Thursday. In partnersip with Zwift (www.zwift.com), we also host ZWIFT RACING LEAGUE, ZWIFT DUATHLON LEAGUE and ZWIFT RUNNING LEAGUE
data.text:
SCRATCH RACES

A straight race for the finish line with Rider Points

Each team's score is determined by adding the total number of points scored by all finishing team members.

Where multiple teams have the same total score in a division, each team's fastest finishing rider will determine the teams finishing position in the leaue.

POINTS RACES

ZRL Points Races incorporate multiple scoring opportunities in the form of segment points and overall Finishing Points (FIN).

First-Across-the-Line (FAL) Segment Points

Designated segments (sprints and climbs) on designated laps will offer FAL points for the first 20 racers to cross the segment's finish line. If a scoring rider's result is annulled, their FAL points remain with the rider but are excluded from any individual or team tally - they are not passed to the next rider. Please refer to ZRL Course Schedule for intermediates in play for each event.

Fastest-Through Segment (FTS) Segment Points

Awarded to the top 10 Fastest Times throughout the race at designated Sprints and climbs. This is scored per race (not per lap).

Finishing Position Scoring (FIN)

FIN points are awarded based on the order that riders finish the race in as follows:

TEAM TIME TRIALS

Team Time Trials are a true test of how 6 team members can work together to get at least 4 racers across the line in the fastest possible time. Team members will need to work together, take turns at the front and maintain as much draft for trailing team members.

Teams are NOT permitted to draft from other teams and dropped team members should never ride or interfere with other teams on course.

Teams are ranked by the time of the 4th rider. 4 riders MUST finish to score League Points and there are no individual rider points (FAL, FTS or FIN) on offer.

League Points are allocated as per the League Points table below based on team rank. 1st place is 20 points, 2nd is 19 and so on.

LEAGUE POINTS

For each Points Race the total Individual rider scores will be COMBINED (totaled) by team and ranked.

Team Time Trials are scored on TEAM finishing position.

The team with the HIGHEST total COMBINED scores will be declared the winner of the race.

In the event of a tie in COMBINED scores (only applies to Points Races), teams are then ranked in the following order:

Finish Points Total

FAL Points Total

FTS Points Total

If a teams total points are still tied, the position of each tied team’s best rider across the finish line shall determine the tied team’s ordering, with the team with the higher placed rider placing higher.

Teams are awarded LEAGUE POINTS for each race in each DIVISION of each LEAGUE as per the descending ranking as follows:

ZRL Community Division final League Standings

At the end of each ROUND, the team with the most LEAGUE POINTS shall be declared the winner of that round.

In the event of a tie on Total League Points, teams are then ranked in the same way as detailed above. This order is Total League/Season Points, Total Finish Line Points, Total FAL points, Total FTS points. In the event that this still results in a tie, it would fall to whichever team had the highest placing rider in the final race.

Where there is more than 1 division per Pace Group Category, at least 1 team will gain promotion to the division above and at least 1 team will be relegated to the division below.

ZRL SEASON FINALE

A team must complete all 6 races in at least 1 round of the season to be elligible to race in the ZRL SEASON FINALE.

Riders must complete at least 3 races, for the team, in any single round of the season to be elligible to race in the ZRL SEASON FINALE.
